base_size.description:
Base grid size.
All other sizes are calculated from this token

input_text.description: Font settings for input fields text

top_label.description: Font settings for input fields label

character_count.description: Font settings for Character counter below textarea input boxes

boxes.description: Corner radius for all form fields

default.description: Used for text on primary button

hover.description: Used for text on primary button on_hover

pill.description: Border raius for pill buttons on all devices

text.description: Link button: default font for desktop

default.description: Background colour for default input fields

corner_radius.description: Border radius for the coloured box behind the message_container

footer_bg.description: Background colour for the bottom message (footer) within message boxes.

footer_fg.description: Text colour for the footer in message boxes.

fg.description: Text colour for the message boxes.

bg.description:
Background colour for message boxes. 
This token will be referenced by the accordion block and contact form backgrounds

title.description: Title font for the Message banners. Also used for  'banner_with_backbox'

footer_text.description: Font used on the banner message box text in the 'footer'

corner_radius.description: Border radius for the message_container frame

bg.description: Used for the hero component at the top of the landing page

title_fg.description: Colour for the title within the headline_banner

paragraph.description: Text colour for the paragraph conent on the headline_banner

title.description: Used for the main title on the headline banner at the top of the landing page

sub_heading.description: Used for the main title on the headline banner at the top of the landing page

paragraph_content.description: Used for the content paragraph on the banner on the top of the landing page

fg.description: Mixed media text colour. Used for headings and paragraphs

title.description: Main title for the mixed_media banner

category.description: Category text shown above main title for the mixed_media banner

paragraph.description: Main content shown below the main title for the mixed_media banner

bg.description: Background colour of the accordion block. This component references the message_container background to keep continuity between the elements

fg.description: Foreground colour of the accordion block.

bg.description: This component references the message_container background to keep continuity between the elements

fg.description: Text colour for any text on the Contact us form. NOTE: this does not include the text linked to the input fields

corner_radius.description: Corner radius for the Contact Us form container

title.description: Contact Us form main title on the landing page

paragraph.description: Contact Us form top paragraph on the landing page

label.description: Used for the terms and conditions text besides the checkbox

title.description: Used for the title on each accordion item. For both open and closed

paragraph.description: Used for the main content; shown when the accordion item is open

small_text.description: Used for small links and notes on the footer

left.description: Used in the 'Ask the Expert' and 'Video library' cards. This style is for the text on the left of the card heading

right.description: Used in the 'Ask the Expert' and 'Video library' cards. This style is for the text on the left of the card heading

primary.description:
Primary colour 

Usage:
Main titles and texts, label texts, icons
Footer background
Buttons
Logo Rose
Hover state

primary_inverse.description:
Primary Inverse

Usage:
Main titles and texts, label text on dark BG
Page background
Search field bg
Buttons
Logo Rose
Card BG

success_foreground.description:
foreground: text messages in forms 
Success text msn

on_dark.description: Used for text on primary background colour
